subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Juan Martín del Potro, playing in his first final since winning the 2009 United States Open, defeated Janko Tipsarevic, 6-4, 6-4, to win the Delray Beach (Fla.) championships.
snippet: Juan Martín del Potro, playing in his first final since winning the 2009 United States Open, defeated Janko Tipsarevic, 6-4, 6-4, to win the Delray Beach (Fla.) championships.
